Technical Consultations

20 February 2019

I am a writer, but I also have over 10-years experience managing teams of IT personal, and have learned a lot about what it takes to make sure a business is communicating effectively.

In addition to my write work, I am also open to discussing solutions in terms of Customer Success, Data + Analytics, and Web for non-profits & social purpose corporations in need of technical assistance.

www.thoughtaboutsolutions.com

Matthew Hendricks
